message: All you people are really fucked up. Go into a Jewish deli and ask for a ham sandwich on Saturday. Or walk into a Muslim store on Ramadan and demand bacon. You can't force a business to do what you want. Period. I know a hotel that wouldn't rent a room with only one bed to a same sex couple who claimed they weren't gay. It is their business practice and should be honored just like I can't demand a Jewish deli cater my party on a Saturday.
